summary: This batch represents infrastructure and platform work across multiple teams, with a major focus on BFF (Backend for Frontend) architecture setup for meal-plans including deployment manifests, observability modules, and shared infrastructure. Additionally, there's ongoing work on OTP (One-Time Purchase) features for Good Chop, Factorform migration to Shopify, and team reorganization under the new MIO (Market Innovation and Optimization) structure.

decisions.what: Adopt OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing across BFFs
decisions.rationale: Standardize tracing infrastructure for observability across all Backend for Frontend services

decisions.what: Use Prometheus for metrics collection with prom-client library
decisions.rationale: Standardize metrics exposure across BFF services for monitoring

decisions.what: Implement Pino logger for structured JSON logging with correlation IDs
decisions.rationale: Enable structured logging with automatic correlation tracking across distributed systems

decisions.what: Use OAM (Open Application Model) manifests for FTCP deployment
decisions.rationale: Standardize deployment configuration for meal-plans BFF across environments

decisions.what: Redirect legacy Factorform users to Shopify site
decisions.rationale: Migrate Factorform platform from legacy to Shopify

decisions.what: NVS team does not require Sentry configuration updates
decisions.rationale: No existing references or alerts found for NVS in Sentry

initiatives.name: BFF Infrastructure & Observability Setup
initiatives.description: Create shared NestJS modules for logging, metrics, tracing, error handling, and documentation to standardize BFF architecture across services

initiatives.name: FTCP Meal-Plans BFF Deployment
initiatives.description: Set up deployment infrastructure for meal-plans BFF including OAM manifests for staging and production with environment-specific configurations

initiatives.name: Factorform Shopify Migration
initiatives.description: Migrate Factorform from legacy platform to Shopify including redirects, SEO updates, and user flow changes

initiatives.name: One-Time Purchase (OTP) Feature Development
initiatives.description: Build out OTP functionality including dashboard order views, tracking, address persistence, and order totals display

initiatives.name: MIO Team Formation & Configuration
initiatives.description: Update tooling and configurations to reflect the newly formed Market Innovation and Optimization team structure

blockers.description: Waiting for RTE Platform team confirmation on Sentry configuration
blockers.impact: Cannot complete Sentry team updates for RTE Systems

technical_patterns.pattern: Shared module architecture for cross-cutting concerns
technical_patterns.context: Creating reusable NestJS modules for logging, metrics, tracing, error handling, and documentation to ensure consistency across all BFF services
Using separate YAML override files for staging and production to manage environment-specific settings like URLs, feature flags, and log levels
Implementing automatic correlation ID extraction from headers and generation for request tracing across distributed systems
Standardizing Kubernetes deployments using OAM manifests with environment-specific resource configurations
Adopting structured logging format for better log parsing and analysis in distributed systems
Generating API documentation automatically from NestJS decorators to maintain up-to-date API specs
Running new address-saving hook in parallel with existing Redux implementation for OTP checkout to enable gradual migration

technical_patterns.pattern: SEO canonical URL updates for platform migration
technical_patterns.context: Updating meta tags and canonical URLs to guide search engines to prioritize new Shopify site over legacy platform

work_themes: BFF architecture and shared module development
Bug fixes for pricing and order calculations
Mobile and native app environment setup

dependencies.context: BFF modules (logging, tracing, metrics) need to be integrated with FTCP deployment infrastructure
Waiting for confirmation on Sentry configuration for RTE Systems
OTP features depend on RCS for addon SKU subscription validation
Legacy Factorform redirects and SEO updates depend on Shopify site being ready
Order tracking functionality depends on tracking link availability and tracking page configuration
Delivery page integration requires address-saving hook for OTP order submission
